servinfo.title: Extension Case Assembly Removal and Installation

servinfosub.title: Removal
servinfosub.ptxt: Remove extension case assembly referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:For Petrol Engine Model .

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure for installation of extension case assembly, noting the following points.

item.ptxt: Extension to transmission bolt: 23 N·m (2.3 kgf-m, 17.0 lbf-ft)
Fill gear oil to extension case referring to Extension Case Oil Change:For Petrol Engine Model .
